data.name: NAVI Bonds
data.subtext: Earn fixed returns with a high level of safety

deals.name: XYZ Bonds
deals.desc:
Invest in High Yield Bonds from NAVI Finserv earning up to 10.0% p.a.
The bond offers fixed returns with a high level of safety, starting from as low as ₹ 10,000 and has been rated IND A/ Stable by India Ratings. Such ratings are considered to have an adequate degree of safety regarding timely servicing of financial obligations

data.name: Invoice Discounting
data.subtext: Invoices raised on a curated set of large & trusted corporates

deals.name: Furlenco
deals.desc: Furlenco is India's leading furniture renting company. Started in 2012, Furlenco's head office is located in Bangalore. This deal will help Furlenco buy the goods required to rent the furniture to their customers.

deals.name: Amazon
deals.desc: Amazon.com, Inc. is an American multinational technology company which focuses on e-commerce, cloud computing, digital streaming, and artificial intelligence. It has been referred to as "one of the most influential economic and cultural forces in the world", and is one of the world's most valuable brands

deals.name: ITC
deals.desc: ITC Limited is an Indian conglomerate company headquartered in Kolkata. ITC has a diversified presence across industries such as FMCG, hotels, software, packaging, paperboards, specialty papers and agribusiness. The company has 13 businesses in 5 segments. It exports its products in 90 countries.

deals.name: Flipkart
deals.desc: Flipkart is an Indian e-commerce company, headquartered in Bangalore, Karnataka, India, and incorporated in Singapore as a private limited company.

deals.name: Rentomojo
deals.desc: RentoMojo is an online rental platform that provides furniture, appliances and electronics (mobiles, laptops) on a monthly rental basis. This deal will help RentoMoJo buy the goods required to rent the furniture to their customers.

deals.name: Sonal Adhesives Limited
deals.desc: Established in 1992, Sonal Adhesives Limited is one of thelargest manufacturers and exporters of self adhesive tapes and various types of Adhesives & Emulsions in India.

deals.name: Birla Century
deals.desc: Birla Century is a division of Century Textiles and Industries Limited, which was incorporated in Mumbai, India, in 1897. They have an extensive network of distributors and dealers in India and they also sell their exclusive range of home-textiles and other products in the global market.

deals.name: BrandStudio
deals.desc: Brand Studio is a Creative Communication Agency catering to the the Atlas Copco Group. They provide creative services to all companies and brands under the Atlas Copco umbrella worldwide.

deals.name: LetsTransport
deals.desc: Lets transport is a “Last mile” logistics solution provider. Their solutions are reliable, professional, economical and structured to serve businesses as well as consumers. They currently provide Tata Ace on demand, this deal will help them fulfill this demand.

deals.name: Bizongo
deals.desc: Bizongo is a business-to-business marketplace focusing upon packaging, textiles, apparel & other contract manufacturing goods as its product portfolio. Through its proprietary digital platforms, such as Procure Live, Partner Hub, and Artwork Flow, Bizongo offers Digital Vendor Management, Supply Chain Automation & Supply Chain Financing as key services to its enterprise customers.

deals.name: Paragon
deals.desc: As a brand that sells all over the country, Paragon needs little or no introduction in the Indian sub-continent. Started in 1975, Paragon is one of the most trusted brands of the country. While rubber footwear continues to be its leading product, the Paragon brand name brings its longstanding assurance of quality and durability to a full range of other footwear products made of Poly-urethane (PU), Poly Vinyl Chloride (PVC), Ethylene-vinyl acetate (EVA) and Thermo Plastic Rubber (TPR) soles too

data.name: Real Estate
data.dealText: Now invest in Grade-A Tech Park

deals.name: Commercial Property, Jaipur
deals.desc: demo

deals.name: Chennai, Commerical Property
deals.desc:
This is an opportunity to invest in an upcoming retail space in Chennai, Tamil Nadu. The plot spans 14,400 sq ft and the total built up area is 21,000 sq ft. The property is leased to a leading apparel brand.
With a long lease tenure and excellent growth prospects, the asset is a lucrative investment opportunity.

deals.name: Commercial Space, Bangalore
deals.desc: The newly constructed & platinum rated building is situated in the largest IT corridor of Bangalore. This is a rare opportunity to acquire an A+ grade asset with a blue chip tenant at an attractive capital value.

deals.name: Embassy Tech Park
deals.desc: This property is a commercial office space in Embassy Tech Park, Bangalore and is currently tenanted by LG Soft India, a 100% subsidiary of LG electronics. The current lease duration is 5 years with a lock in of 3 years. Located in the Bangalore deepest and largest office market, this property is spread over 84,512 sq. ft. The campus boasts of tenants like Cisco, Flipkart, Amazon, Gartner and InMobi among others.

deals.name: Times Square, Mumbai
deals.desc: This property is a commercial office space in Times Square, Mumbai and is currently tenanted by SmartWorks and sub-tenanted by IFTAS . The target annual IRR of this property is 13.6% with an average yield of 10.5%

deals.name: Commercial Property, Jaipur
deals.desc: Jaipur Property

deals.name: Times Square
deals.desc: This property is a commercial office space in Times Square, Mumbai and is currently tenanted by SmartWorks and sub-tenanted by IFTAS . The target annual IRR of this property is 13.6% with an average yield of 10.5%

data.name: Green Investing
data.subtext: Own fractions of solar power plants or electric vehicles

deals.name: AllCargo Logistics
deals.desc: The logistics industry is one of the largest indsutries in India in terms of both scale and growth. This industry focuses on all aspects of the supply chain, starting with transportation, to inventory management and warehousing. The logistics industry in India is expected to be valued at US$15522.02 billion by 2023 in terms of revenues. This Mumbai headquartered Logistics pioneer with one of the largest national transport, warehouse and container depot footprints

deals.name: Shindengen Electric Manufacturing
deals.desc: The automotive space is booming today with millions of families opting to travel in personal vehicles rather than public transport. One of the most integral components of any of these automotive is the semiconductors, solenoids and electronics. A pioneer in this manufacturing space is the Honda motors owned Shindengen Electric Manufacturing. Shindengen has its presence in over 17 different countries, with a growth approach that is backed by ideals of environmental sustainability. Backed by Honda, one of the largest commercial automobile companies, Shindengen's transition to solar power helps scale its operations significantly and sustainably.

deals.name: Bounce EV
deals.desc: This investment opportunity is an avenue for retail investors to tap into the electric mobility space directly. Partnering up with Zuink Mobility, a subsidiary of Bounce allows you to invest in high-performance EVs that ride the city day and night to help you make your returns and offset your carbon footprint. Backed by an MLA ( Master Lease Agreement ) that guarantees a fixed rent per scooter per month ensuring that your returns are fixed and not market dependent. Basis our due diligence processes of screening projects, this investment opportunity has been rated a score of 740 . This is a score only 5% of the assets we due diligence receive and showcases the quality of the investment on all fronts. The deal scores the highest in the space of revenue risks, with strong non-lease cancellable periods, securities and reasonable late fee interest charges.

deals.name: Times of India
deals.desc: The Times of India (also known by its abbreviation TOI) is an Indian English-language daily newspaper and digital news media owned and managed by The Times Group. It is the third-largest newspaper in India by circulation and largest selling English-language daily in the world.

deals.name: ID Fresh Food India
deals.desc: Increasing urbanisation has allowed many people in the Indian population to transition from lower classes to middle classes with a lot of disposable income and lack of time. And in this growing demographic one of the biggest problems faced is the time and effort needed to cook healthy breakfast. This company to be listed on pyse, is a pioneer in manufacturing providing natural, healthy and easy to cook breakfast products. Productising easy, ready to cook breakfast products made them pioneers in the space with the largest market share in the segment and revenues of close to 500 crore rupees expected int he next fiscal year. Backed by some of the biggest and reputed venture capital arms, this company has now built one of the largest homegrown ready to eat breakfast manufacturing plants, going to be powered by solar power for it's operations.

deals.name: Tata Communications
deals.desc: Digital ecosystem enablers have taken the center stage in the global economy due to the way businesses are transitioning their external and internal growth plans. Tata communications lead this race by having a huge piece of the data, leased lines, and corporate voice market share. This investment product is made up of solar modules that will be used by Tata Communications for their business and technology operations in Bangalore. Backed by growing revenue from the data segment; improving, financial risk profile, and financial flexibility enjoyed by being a part of the Tata group are great perks of investing in one of the safest products listed on Green Investing yet

deals.name: Vashi Railway
deals.desc:
Vashi was the first developed hub of Navi Mumbai and is considered as one o the most
organized areas in Navi Mumbai. Its organized structure has only helped in expanding its offerings and making it lucrative for both residential and commercial real estate.

deals.name: Bharat Hotels (The LaLit)
deals.desc: Bharat Hotels Limited (BHL) is involved in the operating hotel. The company offers twelve luxury hotels, places, and resorts and two mid-market segment hotels under The LaLiT Traveller brand offering 2,261 rooms and also holds the management rights to operate a hotel in London offering 70 rooms. The company was promoted by Late Mr. Lalit Suri. BHL was incorporated in 1981 and has its registered office located in Delhi.

deals.name: Bajaj FD
deals.desc: With Bajaj Finance FD on Bajaj Markets, you can earn attractive interest income in a safe market environment. With higher safety ratings and lucrative interest rates of up to 7.75% per annum, this deposit is your one-stop solution for all financial goals be it short-term or long-term. Here is a look at some of the important features and benefits the Bajaj Finance fixed deposit has to offer.

data.name: Private Equity
data.subtext: Invest in India's private leading growth companies

deals.name: Bharat Hotels (The LaLit)
deals.desc: Bharat Hotels Limited (BHL) is involved in the operating hotel. The company offers twelve luxury hotels, places, and resorts and two mid-market segment hotels under The LaLiT Traveller brand offering 2,261 rooms and also holds the management rights to operate a hotel in London offering 70 rooms. The company was promoted by Late Mr. Lalit Suri. BHL was incorporated in 1981 and has its registered office located in Delhi.

deals.name: Dalmia Bharat Refractories Ltd
deals.desc: Dalmia Refractories Limited (DRL) was formerly known as Shri Nataraj Ceramic and Chemical Industries Limited. As per a credit rating report, the company is engaged in manufacturing high alumina refractory bricks and castables. The company has 3 manufacturing units and caters to cement, steel, coke oven and glass industries. DRL is a part of the Dalmia Group.

deals.name: Fincare Small Finance Bank Ltd
deals.desc: Fincare Small Finance Bank is a "digital-first" SFB with a focus on unbanked and under-banked customers, especially in rural and semi-urban areas. The company has a suite of smart banking products such as Savings Accounts, Current Accounts, Fixed Deposits, NRI Fixed Deposits, Recurring Deposits, Micro Loans, Cash Overdraft, Loans against Gold, Loan against property, Institutional Finance and Two-wheeler Loan.

deals.name: Imagine Marketing Ltd (boAt)
deals.desc: Imagine Marketing Limited, the parent company of consumer electronics brand boAt Lifestyle. The company started out with headphones, and now has its presence across categories such as smartwatches through the acquisition of TAGG, gaming accessories through its acquisition of RedGear, and men’s personal care accessories through its sub-brand, Misfit.

deals.name: Ixigo (Le Travenues Technology Ltd)
deals.desc: Ixigo (Le Travenues Technology Limited) is a technology company focused on empowering Indian travellers to plan, book and manage their trips across rail, air, buses and hotels. They assist travellers in making smarter travel decisions by leveraging artificial intelligence, machine learning and data science-led innovations on their OTA platforms, comprising their websites and mobile applications.

deals.name: PharmEasy (API Holdings Ltd)
deals.desc: API Holdings, the parent company of online pharmacy PharmEasy, received approval from markets regulator Sebi to raise Rs 6,250 crore through an initial public offering

deals.name: Reliance Retail Ltd
deals.desc: Reliance Retail is the retail initiative of the Reliance Industries Limited and an epicenter of its consumer facing businesses. It has in a short time forged strong and enduring bonds with millions of consumers by providing them unlimited choice, outstanding value proposition, superior quality and unmatched experience across all its retail stores. Reliance Retail has grown to cater to millions of customers, and thousands of farmers and vendors. Reliance Retail has been ranked as the fastest growing retailer in the world. It is ranked 56th in the list of Top Global Retailers and is the only Indian Retailer to feature in the Top 100. It is the largest and the most profitable retailer in India with the widest reach. It has been ranked as the fastest growing retailer in the world in the Deloitte's Global Powers of Retailing 2020 index.

deals.name: Tata Technologies Ltd (TTL)
deals.desc: Tata Technologies Limited (TTL) is engaged in providing ESO (Engineering Services Outsourcing), IT services, and PLM (Product Lifecycle Management) services. These services are offered primarily to automotive and aerospace manufacturers with range of services like IT consultancy, CAD/CAM engineering and design consultancy, SAP implementation and maintenance and providing networking solutions. The company was incorporated in 1994 and has its registered office located in Pune, Maharashtra.

deals.name: HDFC Securities Ltd
deals.desc: HDFC securities has been serving a diverse customer base of retail and institutional investors, since 2000. It offers an exhaustive product suite to help its customers invest in Equities, IPO/OFS, Buybacks, Mutual Funds, ETFs, Futures & Options for - Equity, Currency and Commodities, Fixed Deposits, Bonds, NCDs and National Pension Scheme, along with value added services like Online Will writing and Tax filing. The company offers a host of digital platforms like Mobile Trading App, Desktop based online trading facility, ProTerminal- an advanced trading platform and Arya- a voice enabled investing assistant.

deals.name: Chennai Super Kings Cricket Limited (CSK)
deals.desc: The Chennai Super Kings also known as CSK is an Indian franchise cricket team located in Chennai, Tamil Nadu, which participates in the Indian Premier League (IPL). The team is sponsored by Muthoot Group, Gulf oil, Equitas small finance bank, India cement, HIL, Nippon paint, Atria convergence technologies and Parle Agro Frooti.

deals.name: Bira91 (B9 Beverages Pvt Ltd)
deals.desc: B9 Beverages Private Limited (BBPL) was formerly known as Divya Jyoti Coaching Institute Private Limited. The company is engaged in the marketing, supplying, and trading of beer in the name of ‘Bira 91’ and its product Bira91 hot sauce. BBPL was incorporated in 2012 and is based in Delhi.

deals.name: Bikaji Foods International Ltd
deals.desc: Bikaji Foods International, a leading manufacturer of snacks and sweets and is among the largest manufacturer of Bikaneri bhujia with annual production of 26,690 tonne in fiscal 2021 and is a leading maker of packaged rasgulla, soan papdi and gulab jamun.

deals.name: Hero Fincorp Ltd
deals.desc: Hero FinCorp is a financial company that offers two-wheeler financing, supply chain finance, and business loans. Hero FinCorp offers retail, home, and digital loans as well as corporate loans such as loans against property, unsecured business loans, medical equipment financing, and working capital loan, enabling clients to obtain the requiredfinancing for their personal and business needs.
